content: What is a good answer to someone angry about price of groceries and Harris/Biden didn't do anything about it

That’s a tough one, but I go with a couple things.  Harris has a plan to cut price gouging by grocery stores to lower the costs of essentials.  Kamala Harris.com/issues  Also, while inflation is tough, Biden & Harris’ skillful management ensured that our inflation rates were actually lower than most of the rest of the world.  They cushioned us from what could have been much worse (sources:  NPR and Morgan Stanley)
That is a good response.  Thanks!
